name: @axelar-network/axelar-gmp-sdk-solidity
description: Solidity GMP SDK and utilities provided by Axelar for cross-chain development

scripts.build: rm -rf artifacts && hardhat compile && npm run copy:artifacts && npm run flatten
scripts.copy:artifacts: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp artifacts/contracts/express/ExpressProxyDeployer.sol/ExpressProxyDeployer.json artifacts/contracts/deploy/ConstAddressDeployer.sol/ConstAddressDeployer.json artifacts/contracts/deploy/Create3Deployer.sol/Create3Deployer.json artifacts/contracts/interfaces/IUpgradable.sol/IUpgradable.json dist/
